mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_receiving (receiver, phone, zip_code, address, is_default, uid) VALUES (#{receiver}, #{phone}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{isDefault}, #{user.id})
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, U.id "user.id", U.account "user.account", U.password "user.password", U.nickname "user.nickname", U.avatar "user.avatar", U.sex "user.sex", U.birthday "user.birthday", U.email "user.email", U.phone "user.phone" FROM shop_receiving R INNER JOIN shop_user U ON R.uid = U.id WHERE R.uid = #{userId}
SELECT R.*, U.* "user.*" FROM shop_receiving R INNER JOIN shop_user U ON R.uid = U.id WHERE R.uid = #{userId} AND R.is_default = 1
